channel.title: Idk what section this goes in... soo... How come everytime I download JDK, it
channel.description:
Oh... well then I'll retype what I was saying.
It opens up Sun(TM) Download Manager, and downloads it, but I don't think it intalls it, cause when I check to see if it's installed(in the add remove programs thing in control panel), it isn't there.
I've tried removing Sun(TM) Download Manager multiple times and restarted my comp after that, but everytime I go to download JDK offline\online installations, it re-installs SUN(TM) Download Manager on my comp and uses that... I can't seem to get it to download on my comp at all.
I'm trying to run my client but everytime I do I get 100 errors and it says this in the run.bat
[code]'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
And the owner of it says that no one else has got those problems.
Also, I'm trying to set a PATH abd CLASSPATH on my comp(Using alexia[Moparscape CM]'s tutorial, but when I get to putting in the variable I got stuck.
[code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_u1\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/code]
I'm not sure if I'm supposed to add some in the place of %CLASSPATH%, leave it there, or completely remove it.
:confused: :confused: :confused:

2: I think your having a problem downloading eh? its probobly because if you download java for the first time you need to be a administrator…make sure that you allow it to access your computer

item.title: Idk what section this goes in... soo... How come everytime I download JDK, it
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Oh… well then I’ll retype what I was saying.

It opens up Sun™ Download Manager, and downloads it, but I don’t think it intalls it, cause when I check to see if it’s installed(in the add remove programs thing in control panel), it isn’t there.

I’ve tried removing Sun™ Download Manager multiple times and restarted my comp after that, but everytime I go to download JDK offline\online installations, it re-installs SUN™ Download Manager on my comp and uses that… I can’t seem to get it to download on my comp at all.

I’m trying to run my client but everytime I do I get 100 errors and it says this in the run.bat

'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

And the owner of it says that no one else has got those problems.

Also, I’m trying to set a PATH abd CLASSPATH on my comp(Using alexia[Moparscape CM]'s tutorial, but when I get to putting in the variable I got stuck.

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_u1\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

I’m not sure if I’m supposed to add some in the place of %CLASSPATH%, leave it there, or completely remove it.
